about_the_game: The Legendary Armory pack contains three mighty weapons and three mythic armor sets to steel your hero for the upcoming battles (available at level 3). Also included is a digital artbook showcasing a range of stunning illustrations and concept artworks from the world of Shadows: Awakening. As if this wasn't enough, you can also treat your ears to the digital soundtrack, featuring the game's atmospheric and compelling musical score.

About the Game

The Legendary Armory pack contains three mighty weapons and three mythic armor sets to steel your hero for the upcoming battles (available at level 3). Also included is a digital artbook showcasing a range of stunning illustrations and concept artworks from the world of Shadows: Awakening. As if this wasn't enough, you can also treat your ears to the digital soundtrack, featuring the game's atmospheric and compelling musical score.
